entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
